title: 0 fps game
body: Just had a 0 frame per second game it came out of nowhere & the last few games i had were fine n playable

replies.body:
FPS issues can be caused by a number of different factors, but if this happens again, I recommend working through our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting).

Let me know if you have any questions.
